name: Hummus
description: Mashed chickpeas with tahini, olive oil, lemon, and garlic.

name: Foul (Fava Beans)
description: Stewed fava beans with olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, and spices.

name: Mutabbal
description: Roasted eggplant mashed with tahini, lemon, and garlic.

name: Stuffed Grape Leaves
description: Grape leaves stuffed with rice and vegetables.

name: Falafel
description: Fried chickpea balls.

name: Musakhan
description: Roasted chicken on taboon bread with caramelized onions, sumac, and pine nuts.

name: Maqluba
description: Rice cooked with eggplant, potatoes, and meat or chicken, flipped when served.

name: Mujadara
description: Rice cooked with lentils and caramelized onions.

name: Qidra
description: Meat cooked with rice and special spices.

name: Mansaf
description: Meat cooked with dried yogurt (jameed) and rice.

name: Kunafa
description: Dessert made from shredded phyllo dough filled with cheese or cream.

name: Maamoul
description: Cookies filled with dates or nuts.

name: Awwameh (Loukoumades)
description: Fried dough balls dipped in syrup.

name: Qatayef
description: Pastries filled with cream or nuts, fried and covered with syrup.

name: Mint Tea
description: Green tea with mint leaves.

name: Arabic Coffee
description: Coffee ground with cardamom.

name: Tamarind Juice
description: Cold and refreshing drink.

name: Lemon Mint Juice
description: Lemon and mint mixed with sugar and water.

name: Falafel Sandwich
description: Pita bread filled with falafel, salad, and tahini sauce.

name: Shawarma Sandwich
description: Pita bread filled with thinly sliced chicken or beef, vegetables, and tahini sauce.

name: Tabbouleh
description: Chopped parsley, tomatoes, onions, mint, bulgur, and olive oil, seasoned with lemon juice.

name: Fattoush
description: Mixed salad with crispy bread, tomatoes, cucumbers, radishes, and sumac, dressed with olive oil and lemon juice.

name: Arabic Salad
description: Simple salad with tomatoes, cucumbers, onions, parsley, and lemon dressing.
